feed.title: REQ BIP # / Discuss - Sweep incoming unconfirmed transactions with a bounty.

entry.title: REQ BIP # / Discuss - Sweep incoming unconfirmed transactions with a bounty.
entry.summary: It seems that someone attempted to increase a transaction and succeeded in getting it approved. The hash values of the parent, child, grandchild, great-grandchild, and great-great-grandchild blocks are provided, but the position of the transaction in the block is not a priority or fee cut line.
